title: Calories in Pimento Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in pimento cheese per serving, including fat, protein, carbs, sodium, and variations for your diet tracking.
assumptions: Standard pimento cheese spread made with sharp cheddar, mayonnaise, diced pimentos, and basic seasonings; per 1 oz (2 tbsp) serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, cheese type, and mayonnaise used. Check labels for exact values when available.

quick_answer.text: 28 g of pimento cheese contains about 109 kcal, primarily from fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Low-fat version (use light mayo and reduced-fat cheese)
Add 1 tbsp chopped pecans per 28 g
Homemade with Greek yogurt instead of mayo

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz of pimento cheese?
faqs.a: About 109 kcal for 28 g of standard pimento cheese.

faqs.q: Is pimento cheese high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 36 g fat per 100 g, mostly from cheese and mayo.

faqs.q: What's the protein in pimento cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 11 g protein per 100 g, from the cheddar cheese.

faqs.q: Does pimento cheese have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 714 mg per 100 g due to cheese and seasonings.

faqs.q: How do calories change with different recipes?
faqs.a: Low-fat versions can drop to 100 kcal per 100 g; added ingredients like nuts increase them.
